text: @ChrisMurphyCT Stop it Murphy. #COVID19 isn't Trump's fault. It started in China. You use anything to paint him negatively. Nobody knows much about this disease, it's new. You're an alarmist. Next time your fellow senator starts prasing communist rulers, you might want to call him out.
